data.name: Msg_ErrorDbCreationImpossible
data.value: Impossible to create the database

data.name: Msg_ErrorInvalidHbmPath
data.value: The path where to export the HBM files is invalid or doesn't exist!

data.name: Msg_ErrorDbInvalidPath
data.value: The path to the database is invalid or the file doesn't exist
data.comment: The path to the database is invalid or the file doesn't exist

data.name: Msg_ErrorSessionFactoryNull
data.value: The session factory is not set. Are you sure you have configured nHibernate for this instance?

data.name: Msg_ErrorSQLiteConfigurationNotSet
data.value: The SQLiteConfiguration is not set!

data.name: Validation_Password
data.value: You didn't entered twice the same password.
data.comment: You didn't entered twice the same password.

data.name: Validation_PasswordCantBeEmpty
data.value: The password can't be empty
data.comment: The password can't be empty

data.name: Msg_ErrorSessionAlreadyOpenException
data.value: A session is already opened. Please, close the opened session before opening a new one.
data.comment: A session is already opened. Please, close the opened session before opening a new one.

data.name: Msg_ErrorSessionNotOpen
data.value: The session is not open. Please open it before querying the database.
data.comment: The session is not open. Please open it before query the database.

data.name: Ex_QueryException_SeveralDefaultUsers
data.value: More than one default user was found.
data.comment: More than one default user was found.

data.name: Explanation_Administer
data.value: A user with this right can modify data about administration
data.comment: A user with this right can modify data about administration

data.name: Explanation_Everyone
data.value: Everyone can execute this feature
data.comment: Everyone can execute this feature

data.name: Explanation_Metawrite
data.value: A user with this right can modify data about himself/herself such as his/her password
data.comment: A user with this right can modify data about himself/herself such as his/her password

data.name: Explanation_Read
data.value: A user with this right can read data
data.comment: A user with this right can read data

data.name: Explanation_Write
data.value: A user with this right can write and edit data (but not about himself/herself or administration)
data.comment: A user with this right can write and edit data (but not about himself/herself or administration)

data.value: Administer
data.comment: Administer

data.comment: Everyone

data.name: Task_Write

data.name: Explanation_Administrator
data.value: The administrator has all the rights in the application
data.comment: The administrator has all the rights in the application

data.name: Explanation_Doctor
data.value: The doctor can read and mofify all the data but he/she cant read or modify adlinistration data
data.comment: The doctor can read and mofify all the data but he/she cant read or modify adlinistration data

data.name: Explanation_Secretary
data.value: The secretary can read all the data but only modify the calendar
data.comment: The secretary can read all the data but only modify the calendar

data.name: Role_Administrator
data.value: Administrator
data.comment: Administrator

data.name: Role_Doctor

data.comment: Doctor

data.comment: Secretary

data.name: Explanation_EditCalendar
data.value: Un utilisateur qui a ce droit peut ajouter, modifier ou supprimer des rendez-vous dans l'agenda.
data.comment: A user with this right can add, update or delete apointments in the calendar.

data.name: Task_EditCalendar
data.value: Editer les agendas
data.comment: Edit calendars
